objects.text:
• Complete Apple ecosystem integration
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display
• iPad & iPhone included
• Premium build quality

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem integration for seamless workflow
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Large trackpad with Multi-Touch gesture support
• Full-size iPad with high-resolution Retina display
• Latest iPhone model with advanced camera system
• All devices feature sleek aluminum design
• Built-in synchronization across all devices via iCloud
• Latest operating systems: macOS, iPadOS, and iOS
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and power users
• Includes all essential Apple connectivity features
• Ideal for remote work, content creation, and entertainment
• Premium build quality and long-lasting performance

banner_details:
This visually striking promotional banner highlights a premium tech bundle with a clean and modern layout. The headline (`heading`) boldly announces the theme in large white typography over a dark background, immediately drawing attention. A secondary text block (`subheading`) reinforces the product type. A vibrant red callout (`tagline`) emphasizes the urgency of the flash sale. Key features are listed using succinct bullet points in the `description` section using a darker gray tone. A large price highlight (`price`) captures interest at the bottom above a strong red call-to-action button (`cta`) labeled appropriately. The product is showcased visually (`product_image`) to enhance appeal. A sense of exclusivity is emphasized with a crisp note (`urgency_text`). The layout integrates geometric shapes and grid lines for structure.

**Color Palette**:
- Background White: `#F5F5F7`
- Primary Black: `#000000`
- Callout Red: `#e74c3c`
- Light Gray Grid: `#A2AAAD`
- Dark Gray Text: `#333333`
- Accent White Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases Apple devices featuring a sleek, modern aesthetic. Key colors include Space Gray and Silver (#A2AAAD) on device bodies, Black (#000000) on keyboards and screens, and White (#FFFFFF) for screen text and bezels. The laptop wallpaper introduces a soft gradient sunset sky, blending Warm Pink (#E3A5C2), Golden Peach (#F2C9A2), and Mauve (#CBA6C3), which contrast beautifully against the cool, reflective water tones of Taupe Gray (#ABA5A3). These colors subtly highlight the devices while maintaining visual harmony. A banner using this palette can emphasize elegance and innovation, with warm tones drawing attention and metallics providing a premium feel.
